QuestData.Title: Reinforcements Denied
QuestData.Description: The Alliance has brought in their mages to summon more reinforcements directly to the battlefield from beyond their fortress. This must be stopped!$B$BTheir numbers are few, but a single portal can turn the tide of battle. Attack their mages and shut off those portals!
QuestData.RewardText: With no link to the outside, the Alliance must rely on what they've brought to the swamp. We shall see if they can handle our home environment.
